hand.name: Impeded
hand.description: Impeded cards have no use in the game. They represent setbacks the players face when trying to achieve their goals. They cannot be played or discarded during the strategy or buy phase. They can only be trashed or discarded during the cleanup phase.

deck.name: Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card)
deck.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck and deals 3 damage during the combat phase.

discard.name: Precision Strike (1 damage, 1 trash)
discard.description: Allow the player to trash 1 card from their hand during their cleanup phase and deals 1 damage during the combat phase.

discard.name: Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)
discard.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck then they gain 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

discard.description: Allow the player to draw an additional card from their deck and play 2 more strategy cards.

cardSupply.name: Counter Espionage (2 actions, 2 impede)
cardSupply.description: Allow the player to play 2 more strategy cards and add 2 Impeded cards (from the supply) to their opponents discard pile.

cardSupply.name: Preemptive Intelligence (2 actions, 1 card)
cardSupply.description: Allow the player to draw an additional card from their deck and play 2 more strategy cards.

cardSupply.name: Aggressive Acquisition (2 actions, 1 buy)
cardSupply.description: Allow the player to play 2 more strategy cards and lets them buy an additional card during their buy phase.

cardSupply.name: Defensive Maneuver (1 defense, 1 action)
cardSupply.description: Allow the player to play 1 more strategy card and also adds 1 defense during the combat phase.

cardSupply.name: Trade Negotiations (200 credits, 1 buy)
cardSupply.description: The player gains 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

cardSupply.name: Technology Investment (2 defense, 2 trash)
cardSupply.description: Adds 2 defense during the combat phase and allows the player to trash 2 cards from their hand during their cleanup phase.

cardSupply.name: Braintrust Accumulation (3 cards)
cardSupply.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 3 cards from their deck.

card.name: Preemptive Intelligence (2 actions, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to draw an additional card from their deck and play 2 more strategy cards.

moves.description: Draw Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)

card.name: Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck then they gain 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

moves.description: Play Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)

card.name: Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck then they gain 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

card.name: Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck and deals 3 damage during the combat phase.

card.name: Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck and deals 3 damage during the combat phase.

card.name: Preemptive Intelligence (2 actions, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to draw an additional card from their deck and play 2 more strategy cards.

moves.description: Buy Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card) (800 credits)

card.name: Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck and deals 3 damage during the combat phase.

card.name: Hydrogen 100
card.description: Can be spent for 100 credits. Also if you have less health than your opponent you may discard all of your Hydrogen cards in hand and redraw that many cards

card.name: Critical Hit (3 damage, 1 card)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck and deals 3 damage during the combat phase.

card.name: Impeded
card.description: Impeded cards have no use in the game. They represent setbacks the players face when trying to achieve their goals. They cannot be played or discarded during the strategy or buy phase. They can only be trashed or discarded during the cleanup phase.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Counter Espionage (2 actions, 2 impede) (300 credits)

card.name: Counter Espionage (2 actions, 2 impede)
card.description: Allow the player to play 2 more strategy cards and add 2 Impeded cards (from the supply) to their opponents discard pile.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Aggressive Acquisition (2 actions, 1 buy) (300 credits)

card.name: Aggressive Acquisition (2 actions, 1 buy)
card.description: Allow the player to play 2 more strategy cards and lets them buy an additional card during their buy phase.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Defensive Maneuver (1 defense, 1 action) (300 credits)

card.name: Defensive Maneuver (1 defense, 1 action)
card.description: Allow the player to play 1 more strategy card and also adds 1 defense during the combat phase.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Trade Negotiations (200 credits, 1 buy) (400 credits)

card.name: Trade Negotiations (200 credits, 1 buy)
card.description: The player gains 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Technology Investment (2 defense, 2 trash) (500 credits)

card.name: Technology Investment (2 defense, 2 trash)
card.description: Adds 2 defense during the combat phase and allows the player to trash 2 cards from their hand during their cleanup phase.

card.name: Braintrust Accumulation (3 cards)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 3 cards from their deck.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy) (500 credits)

card.name: Impose Tariffs (200 credits, 1 card, 1 buy)
card.description: Allow the player to immediately draw 1 card from their deck then they gain 200 more credits and can buy an additional card during their buy phase.

availableNextMoves.description: Buy Precision Strike (1 damage, 1 trash) (600 credits)

card.name: Precision Strike (1 damage, 1 trash)
card.description: Allow the player to trash 1 card from their hand during their cleanup phase and deals 1 damage during the combat phase.

card.name: Hydrogen 100
card.description: Can be spent for 100 credits. Also if you have less health than your opponent you may discard all of your Hydrogen cards in hand and redraw that many cards

card.name: Oxygen 200
card.description: Can be spent for 200 credits.

card.name: Carbon 300
card.description: Can be spent for 300 credits.
